name: Stone TD
description:
Invaders are coming to steal your Crystal! Tap the nearby Stones for resources and build Walls and Towers to defend yourself. But beware, the Stones seek revenge.

Once you defeat the Invaders in the puzzle-like levels, the Stones you tapped for resources awaken and seek to destroy your Crystal. Awakened Stones merge together if nearby and can easily thwart your defences if you don't plan carefully.

Credits

Made as part of Global Game Jam 2022. Here's the submission page 🙂 

  • SFX by MaxwellDexter
  • Music tracks by Aidan Dissonance and Eamon90
  • All other development by bilalakil
  • See other references in the README
